summary: Pankaj M Munjal is an Indian businessman and the chairman and managing director of Hero Cycles Limited, based in Punjab, India. He took over the company from his father, Om Prakash Munjal, in 2015. Munjal has a love for automobiles and completed his early schooling at The Lawrence School, Sanawar. He graduated in Science and received training in Automotive Manufacturing at Kettering University in the USA. He also attended executive programs in Strategic Marketing Management at London Business School and Harvard University.

Munjal joined his father's company in 1988 and became Co-chairman and managing director in 2011. He took over the executive responsibilities of Hero Cycles Ltd in 2010 after the Munjal family realigned its businesses. He became chairman and managing director at Hero Motors Limited in July 2015. In addition to his roles at Hero Cycles, Munjal has been a non-executive director at Munjal Showa Limited since May 16, 1985. He headed Hero Motors Ltd., which he established in 1988, and was the leader in the automotive moped segment with its brand Hero Puch.

References include articles from Bloomberg News, Daily News and Analysis, Aon Hewitt Manufacturing Industry Rewards Conference 2017, Businessworld, The Hindu Business Line, India Infoline, and The Times of India.

Pankaj M Munjal is an Indian businessman and the chairman and managing director for Hero Cycles Limited, based in Punjab, India. He was born on December 15, 1962, in Ludhiana, Punjab, India. He took over the executive duties for Hero Cycles Ltd in 2010 and became the chairman and managing director of Hero Motors Limited in July 2015. He has been a non-executive director of Munjal Showa Limited since May 16, 1985.
Pankaj M Munjal's net worth is estimated to be $5 Million as of December 11, 2023. He is one of the richest businesspersons from India. His source of income is primarily from his business ventures.
Pankaj M Munjal's height, weight, and body measurements are not available at this time.
Pankaj M Munjal is possibly single and has not been previously engaged. As of December 1, 2023, he is not dating anyone.
Pankaj M Munjal celebrates his birthday on December 15 every year. He is ranked among the most popular businesspersons and is also listed among the famous people born in India.
Aditya Munjal is the CEO of Hero Lectro, the market leader in the e-cycle category in India. He is the son of Pankaj Munjal and the grandson of Om Prakash Munjal of the Hero Group.
Pankaj Munjal is the Chairman and Managing Director of Hero Cycles Ltd.

Hero Cycles was founded in 1956 by Brijmohan Lall Munjal, Om Prakash Munjal, Satyanand Munjal, and Dayanand Munjal. The company is headquartered in Ludhiana, Punjab, India, and Pankaj M Munjal is one of the key people associated with it.
Charu Munjal is a Whole-Time Director at Shivam Autotech Ltd.

Firefox Bikes Private Limited is an Indian company incorporated on October 25, 2004. It is a private unlisted company classified as 'company limited by shares' with an authorized capital of Rs 100.0 lakhs and 80.0% paid-up capital.

The article provides a detailed family tree of Pawan Munjal, the Managing Director of Hero MotoCorp and head of the Hero Group. It includes information about his parents, siblings, children, and extended family members. The article also highlights notable achievements and roles of some family members, such as Geeta Anand and Arjun Anand.

Pawan Munjal is the third child of Brijmohan Lall Munjal and Santosh Munjal. He has three siblings: Sunil Kant Munjal, Raman Kant Munjal, and Suman Kant Munjal. His cousins include Pankaj Munjal, Neeta Seth, Priyanka Malhotra, Neeru Khanna, and Poonam Soni.

Geeta Anand is an Indian businesswoman who has received several prestigious awards, including the Bhartiya Udyog Ratan Award and the Women Entrepreneur Award. Her son, Arjun Anand, is a management professional with extensive experience in the auto industry.

Anuj Munjal has held various executive positions, including Executive Director at Munjal Auto Industries and Director at Hero Steels Limited. He has a background in marketing and finance from D’Amore-McKim School of Business at Northeastern University and Sardar Patel University.

The family tree includes detailed information about multiple generations of the Munjal family, including their birthdates, marriages, and children. Notable family members include Pankaj Munjal, Neeta Seth, Poonam Soni, and Neeru Khanna, among others.

Pankaj M Munjal is an Indian businessman, and chairman and managing director of Hero Cycles Limited, based in Punjab, India. He took over the company from his father in 2015. Born on 15 December 1962, Munjal completed his early schooling at The Lawrence School, Sanawar, and graduated in Science and training in Automotive Manufacturing at Kettering University. He also attended executive programs at London Business School and Harvard University. Munjal joined his father's company in 1988 and became Co-chairman and managing director in 2011. He took over the executive responsibilities of Hero Cycles Ltd in 2010 and became chairman and managing director at Hero Motors Limited in July 2015. He has been a non-executive director at Munjal Showa Limited since May 16, 1985.
